0.title: Did Centre launch ‘PM Kardata Kalyan Yojana’ scheme to reward taxpayers?
0.text: A video of a presenter explaining some provisions for taxpayers under the ‘PM Kardata Kalyan Yojana’, which he claims will come into effect from 01 April 2025, is going viral on social media platforms. GOOD NEWS!! For all TAX PAYERS. pic.twitter.com/GtrkRBK1pr — Bhupy (@singhbhupy7) April 7, 2025 The same claim was published as an article ...
0.author: Arun Nag

1.title: Video claims Priyanka Gandhi protesting on streets against Waqf Bill; Fact Check
1.text: A video featuring Congress leader and Wayanad MP Priyanka Gandhi Vadra sitting on the road amid a crowd of police personnel has gone viral on social media. The caption reads in Hindi:”काँग्रेस वक्फ बिल पर भाजपा सरकार को बेल्ट ट्रीटमेंट दे रही है। जयराम रमेश ने कहा है कि वक्फ बिल के खिलाफ हम सुप्रीम ...
1.author: Arun Nag

2.title: Was Rahul Gandhi Absent During Waqf Bill Debate? Fact-Check
2.text: A video showing Rahul Gandhi entering Parliament on the night of April 2, 2025, is being shared online with a misleading claim that he skipped the discussion on the Waqf (Amendment) Bill. When it’s time to speak about Muslims Rights Rahul Gandhi Always be silenced & Mohabbat Ki Dukan Always be closed The Absent of ...
2.author: Arun Nag

3.title: Is Vitamin D the single most effective medicine against cancer? Fact-Check
3.text: A social media claim is going viral stating that Vitamin D is the single most effective medicine against cancer. It claims that the vitamin exceeds the benefits of any cancer drug known to modern science would provide. See the claim: Vitamin D is the single most effective medicine against cancer, far outpacing the benefits of ...
3.author: Sridevi P

4.title: Video depicts self-deported Ranjani Srinivasan raising ‘Azadi’ slogans in US; Fact Check
4.text: Amid the controversy over self-deported Indian PhD scholar of Columbia University Ranjani Srinivasan, a video depicting a sloganeering woman supporting the Palestine cause at a rally is being shared widely on social media. The claim says that the woman is Ranjani Srinivasan and that she is chanting “azadi” slogans and was deported. See the claims: ...
4.author: Arun Nag

5.title: Did Sundar Pichai endorse ‘Google Invest’ platform? Fact Check
5.text: A video featuring Google and Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai is circulating on social media, with a claim that he is endorsing an investment platform called ‘Google Invest’ where higher returns are guaranteed. In the video, Pichai is shown as saying, “Google invest is not just a platform, it is your personal key to financial independence ...
5.author: Sridevi P
